entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 a.m. EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pond Inlet Airport 1:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 4 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow at times. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
